# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty graph structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializing a graph

- **init(data:size:)**: Creates a graph structure from the specified opaque graph object.

items.description: Creates a graph structure from the specified opaque graph object.
